author: tabish
msg: Changing the close behavior of the Scoket classes.  We don't want to delete streams in the socket close methods as there could be someone using them in a read thread.  We want to close them in close and delete them in the dtor.

author: ate
msg: WICKET-1155: WebResponse.redirect(url) calls response.encodeRedirect(url) which is formally not supported on JSR-168 and thus can result in a NPE
